channel.title: Stats that restore?
channel.description:
Hey, most servers sources already have this, but mine doesn't apparently... For example, if I drink a strength potion at 120 strength, then I'll have 144 strength, but now, it won't restore, it just stays there... Any1 know how to make it restore?
BUT, it could be just because that my stat list doesn't refresh... maybe it's because of that...
And another thing, how do I make it so that the prayer restores? So if its at zero, it'll slow recover?
Thanks.
